# 204个国家SDI不平等分析

```{r}
# 模拟数据
set.seed(123)
data <- data.frame(
  country = sample(c("USA", "CHN", "IND", "BRA", "JPN", "FRA", "NGA", "ZAF", "KEN", "RUS"), 100, replace = TRUE),
  SDI = runif(100, 0.2, 0.9),  # SDI 介于0~1之间
  asthma_prevalence = rnorm(100, mean = 5000, sd = 1500) + runif(100, 0.2, 0.9)*5000  # SDI越高，患病率越高
)


# 加载必要的包
library(ggplot2)

# 散点图绘制
ggplot(data, aes(x = SDI, y = asthma_prevalence, label = country)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = SDI), size = 2, alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_color_gradient(low = "purple", high = "green") +
  geom_text(size = 2, vjust = -0.5, check_overlap = TRUE) +
  labs(
    title = "Asthma age-standardised prevalence rate by SDI (Simulated)",
    x = "Socio-demographic Index (SDI)",
    y = "Asthma Prevalence Rate per 100,000 population",
    color = "SDI"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 12)
```
